thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 21 of 622
thread.title: Sydney Russom

author: Sydney Russom
title: Sydney Russom
text: Some clothes are only available to people sized more petite because there are not enough clothes made for average women, and if they are available its usually for clothes an average women is not confident to rock. Like shirts with the random/ revealing slits or the see through shirts. Love a ton of the things on this site and the employees are lovely. But not a site for most average women
